data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the Great Armory.
The Great Armory is a long room filled too to bottom with shelves and racks of weapons of every sort. Swords of every length, weight and style, likes longer than a man is tall, Morning Star maces, longbows, horse bows, crossbows, axes...they're all there.
There's a mace, a Axe, a crossbow, a chain, a sword, a bow, and a longbows here.
The a squire still keeping everything sharp and the brother are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I want to shoot an arrow with the crossbow
data.mid_motivation: I want to inspect the weapons in the great Armory today
data.long_motivation: I want my army to be battle ready at all times
